1: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֤י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>the Canaanite</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And [when] king</n> עֲרָד֙ <sup>6166 </sup> <n>Arad</n> יֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which dwelt</n> הַנֶּ֔גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>in the south</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>tell that Israel</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> הָאֲתָרִ֑ים <sup>871 </sup> <n>of the spies</n> וַיִּלָּ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>then he fought</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n> וַיִּ֥שְׁבְּ ׀ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>and took</n> מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>some</n> שֶֽׁבִי׃ <sup>7628 </sup> <n>[some] of them prisoners</n>
2: וַיִּדַּ֨ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>vowed</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> נֶ֛דֶר <sup>5088 </sup> <n>a vow</n> לַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> נָתֹ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>If thou wilt indeed</n> תִּתֵּ֜ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָ֤ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>this people</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> בְּיָדִ֔י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into my hand</n> וְהַֽחֲרַמְתִּ֖י <sup>2763 </sup> <n>then I will utterly destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>their cities</n>
3: וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearkened</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> בְּק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>to the voice</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיִּתֵּן֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and delivered up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>the Canaanites</n> וַיַּחֲרֵ֥ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>and they utterly destroyed</n> אֶתְהֶ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עָרֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>them and their cities</n> וַיִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and he called</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of the place</n> חָרְמָֽה׃ <sup>2767 </sup> <n>Hormah</n> פ
4: וַיִּסְע֞וּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>And they journeyed</n> מֵהֹ֤ר <sup>2023 </sup> <n>Hor</n> הָהָר֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>from mount</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> יַם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> ס֔וּף <sup>5488 </sup> <n>of the Red</n> לִסְבֹ֖ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>to compass</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> אֱד֑וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <sup>7114 </sup> <n>was much discouraged</n> נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and the soul</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>because of the way</n>

7: וַיָּבֹא֩ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> הָעָ֨ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Therefore the people</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֹשֶׁ֜ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>to Moses</n> וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> חָטָ֗אנוּ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>We have sinned</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> דִבַּ֤רְנוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>for we have spoken</n> בַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> וָבָ֔ךְ הִתְפַּלֵּל֙ <sup>6419 </sup> <n>and against thee pray</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>with</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> וְיָסֵ֥ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>that he take away</n> מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <sup>5175 </sup> <n>the serpents</n> וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>prayed</n> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>from us And Moses</n> בְּעַ֥ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>for</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for the people</n>

22: אֶעְבְּרָ֣ה <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Let me pass</n> בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <sup>776 </sup> <n>through thy land</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>We will not</n> נִטֶּה֙ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>we will not turn</n> בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>into the fields</n> וּבְכֶ֔רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>or into the vineyards</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>we will not</n> נִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>we will not drink</n> מֵ֣י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[of] the waters</n> בְאֵ֑ר <sup>875 </sup> <n>of the well</n> בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[high] way</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>by the king's</n> נֵלֵ֔ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will go</n> עַ֥ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> נַעֲבֹ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>until we be past</n> גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>thy borders</n>
23: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>would not suffer</n> סִיחֹ֣ן <sup>5511 </sup> <n>And Sihon</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> עֲבֹ֣ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>to pass</n> בִּגְבֻלוֹ֒ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>through his border</n> וַיֶּאֱסֹ֨ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>together</n> סִיחֹ֜ן <sup>5511 </sup> <n>but Sihon</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמּ֗וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>all his people</n> וַיֵּצֵ֞א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n> לִקְרַ֤את <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> הַמִּדְבָּ֔רָה <sup>4057 </sup> <n>into the wilderness</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and he came</n> יָ֑הְצָה <sup>3096 </sup> <n>to Jahaz</n> וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and fought</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n>
24: וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smote</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>him with the edge</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n> וַיִּירַ֨שׁ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and possessed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצ֜וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>his land</n> מֵֽאַרְנֹ֗ן <sup>769 </sup> <n>from Arnon</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> יַבֹּק֙ <sup>2999 </sup> <n>unto Jabbok</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>even unto the children</n> עַמּ֔וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַ֔ז <sup>5794 </sup> <n>[was] strong</n> גְּב֖וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>for the border</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n>
25: וַיִּקַּח֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הֶעָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>all these cities</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelt</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in all the cities</n> הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> בְּחֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>in Heshbon</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בְּנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and in all the villages</n>
26: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>For Heshbon</n> עִ֗יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>[was] the city</n> סִיחֹ֛ן <sup>5511 </sup> <n>of Sihon</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> הִ֑וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> נִלְחַ֗ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>who had fought</n> בְּמֶ֤לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> מוֹאָב֙ <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>against the former</n> וַיִּקַּ֧ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and taken</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אַרְצ֛וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>all his land</n> מִיָּד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of his hand</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> אַרְנֹֽן׃ <sup>769 </sup> <n>even unto Arnon</n>
27: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יֹאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> הַמֹּשְׁלִ֖ים <sup>4911 </sup> <n>Wherefore they that speak in proverbs</n> בֹּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Come</n> חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>into Heshbon</n> תִּבָּנֶ֥ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>be built</n> וְתִכּוֹנֵ֖ן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>and prepared</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>let the city</n> סִיחֽוֹן׃ <sup>5511 </sup> <n>of Sihon</n>
28: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>For there is a fire</n> יָֽצְאָ֣ה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>gone out</n> מֵֽחֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>of Heshbon</n> לֶהָבָ֖ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>a flame</n> מִקִּרְיַ֣ת <sup>7151 </sup> <n>from the city</n> סִיחֹ֑ן <sup>5511 </sup> <n>of Sihon</n> אָֽכְלָה֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>it hath consumed</n> עָ֣ר <sup>6144 </sup> <n>Ar</n> מוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> בַּעֲלֵ֖י <sup>1167 </sup> <n>the dominant</n> בָּמ֥וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>height</n> אַרְנֹֽן׃ <sup>769 </sup> <n>of Arnon</n>
29: אוֹי־ <sup>188 </sup> <n>Woe</n> לְךָ֣ מוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>to thee Moab</n> אָבַ֖דְתָּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>thou art undone</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>O people</n> כְּמ֑וֹשׁ <sup>3645 </sup> <n>of Chemosh</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he hath given</n> בָּנָ֤יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his sons</n> פְּלֵיטִם֙ <sup>6412 </sup> <n>that escaped</n> וּבְנֹתָ֣יו <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and his daughters</n> בַּשְּׁבִ֔ית <sup>7628 </sup> <n>captive</n> לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> אֱמֹרִ֖י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> סִיחֽוֹן׃ <sup>5511 </sup> <n>unto Sihon</n>
30: וַנִּירָ֛ם <sup>3384 </sup> <n>We have shot</n> אָבַ֥ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>is perished</n> חֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <sup>2809 </sup> <n>at them Heshbon</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> דִּיב֑וֹן <sup>1769 </sup> <n>even unto Dibon</n> וַנַּשִּׁ֣ים <sup>8074 </sup> <n>and we have laid them waste</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> נֹ֔פַח <sup>5302 </sup> <n>even unto Nophah</n> אֲשֶׁ֖רׅ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> מֵֽידְבָֽא׃ <sup>4311 </sup> <n>which [reacheth] unto Medeba</n>
31: וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelt</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Thus Israel</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n>
32: וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>And Moses</n> לְרַגֵּ֣ל <sup>7270 </sup> <n>to spy out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יַעְזֵ֔ר <sup>3270 </sup> <n>Jaazer</n> וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <sup>3920 </sup> <n>and they took</n> בְּנֹתֶ֑יהָ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the villages</n> [וַיִּירֶשׁ כ] (וַיֹּ֖ורֶשׁ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>cast out</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֱמֹרִ֥י <sup>567 </sup> <n>the Amorites</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
33: וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <sup>6437 </sup> <n>And they turned</n> וַֽיַּעֲל֔וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and went up</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> וַיֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> עוֹג֩ <sup>5747 </sup> <n>and Og</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> לִקְרָאתָ֜ם <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> ה֧וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמּ֛וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>them he and all his people</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to the battle</n> אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <sup>154 </sup> <n>at Edrei</n>
34: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto Moses</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֣א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>into</n> בְיָדְךָ֞ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him into thy hand</n> נָתַ֧תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>him not for I have delivered</n> אֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַמּ֖וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all his people</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצ֑וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and his land</n> וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and thou shalt do</n> לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשִׂ֗יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to him as thou didst</n> לְסִיחֹן֙ <sup>5511 </sup> <n>unto Sihon</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which dwelt</n> בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <sup>2809 </sup> <n>at Heshbon</n>
35: וַיַּכּ֨וּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>So they smote</n> אֹת֤וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנָיו֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>him and his sons</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all his people</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> בִּלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>until there was none</n> הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>left</n> ל֖וֹ שָׂרִ֑יד <sup>8300 </sup> <n>him alive</n> וַיִּֽירְשׁ֖וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and they possessed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>his land</n>
